about_the_game:
Ahoy Ylander and welcome!

You just got your Adventurers Handbook, received your first quest and now you want to go out there and explore it all?

Into this 2.99$ bundle, we've packed 20$ worth of value to help you get started faster!

The Starter Pack is overflowing with resource bundles containing clay to craft those first crucial workstations, flint to get arrows to defend yourself, healing herbs to heal when you don't manage to defend yourself, feathers, leather and more. On top of that, you will receive sturdy new tools and inventory containers to put them in.

And to make your journeys even more exciting, this Starter Pack will unlock the entire Arid Region for you!

Aaaand... 300 Coyns so that you can grab something from the in-game shop!

To put it nice and neat, this is what you'll get:

• Starter resources (20 Clay, 10 Leather, 15 Flint, 20 Feather, 10 Healing herb, 30 Stone)
• Starter tools (Obsidian pick, Obsidian Knife, Wooden Fishing Rod)
• Inventory containers (Herb bag, Toolbox, Lunchbox)
• "Bushcraft Frame" player avatar frame
• Arid Region instant access
• 300 Coyns

for helpful tips, new friends and much more!

With a head start like this, you are sure to...

Stay Classy!



*Note: this pack can be purchased only once.

name: Ylands - Starter Pack
short_description: This Starter pack is your way towards faster early game progression with key resources, containers expanding inventory space, instant Arid region unlock, and much more to get you started! Get this pack, grab your Adventurers Handbook, and set sail towards an unforgettable adventure!
supported_languages:
English*, Spanish - Spain, Czech, French, Italian, German, Russian
*languages with full audio support
